i like the 1922 version black and white. there are two versions of the 1922, the one with tinted, and the other is just black & white which was released by alpha. :))
I have the one with the tints, that's used to tell us the difference between night and day.

oh, i see. i also have that version too. anyway, do you have "He Walked By Night" - 1948 film noir?
